name: v2_media_types
schema: CREATE TABLE `v2_media_types` (`description` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `display_name` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `icon` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `id` TEXT PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT ('r'||lower(hex(randomblob(7)))) NOT NULL, `name` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `slug` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `sort_order` NUMERIC DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL)
